loaddata module¶

Functions for loading and formatting data files as datastats.DataStats objects. [1] Spirtes, Glymour, and Scheines (SGS), Causation, Prediction, and Search, 2nd ed.

loaddata.load_file(fname, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create DataStats object from sample data in file.

Parameters:
  • fname – file name
  • kwargs – pass through kwargs to numpy.loadtext
Returns:

DataStats object
loaddata.lucas0_train()[source]¶

Load LUCAS0 training dataset, retrieved from http://www.causality.inf.ethz.ch/challenge.php?page=datasets

Returns:DataStats object containing LUCAS0 sample data
loaddata.pubprod()[source]¶

Load example statistics on publication productivity from [1], sec. 5.8.1, p. 97. Note that raw sample data is not provided - only correlation matrix.

Returns:DataStats object containing statistics
